snippet.title: Title: The Milky Way in X-rays for an outside observer: Log(N)-Log(S) and Luminosity Function of X-ray binaries from RXTE/ASM data
snippet.description:
Title: The Milky Way in X-rays for an outside observer: Log(N)-Log(S) and Luminosity Function of X-ray binaries from RXTE/ASM data
Authors: H.-J. Grimm (1), M. Gilfanov ((1) and (2)), R. Sunyaev ((1) and (2)), ((1) Max-Planck-Institut fuer Astrophysik, (2) Space Reseach Institute)
Comments: 23 pages, 19 figures, accepted by A&A
Journal-ref: Astron.Astrophys.391:923-944,2002
Subjects: Astrophysics (astro-ph)
